  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1212</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Mivneh Machneh Yisrael: Multiple Intelligences Unit on Bamidbar 1-21</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mivneh Machneh Yisrael: Mehrfache 
Intelligenz-Maßeinheit auf Bamidbar 1-21</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mivneh Machneh Yisrael : Unité 
d'intelligences multiple sur Bamidbar 1-21</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Mivneh Machneh Yisrael: Unidade de 
inteligências múltipla em Bamidbar 1-21</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Mivneh Machneh Yisrael: Unità di 
intelligenza multipla su Bamidbar 1-21</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Mivneh Machneh Yisrael: Πολλαπλάσια 
μονάδα Intelligences σε Bamidbar 1-21</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Mivneh Machneh Yisrael: Unidad de 
inteligencias múltiple en Bamidbar 1-21</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">learners study Bamidbar 1-2 in-depth before completing a creative MI project of their own choosing. Projects are then presented to the class.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">bamidbar</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">bnei israel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hashem</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">egypt</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">bible</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anfängerstudie Bamidbar 1-2 eingehend, bevor ein 
kreatives MI Projekt ihres eigenen Wählens durchgeführt wird. 
Projekte werden dann der Kategorie dargestellt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">étude Bamidbar 1-2 d'étudiants détaillé avant 
de terminer un projet créateur de MI de leur propre choix. Des 
projets sont alors présentés à la classe.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">estudo Bamidbar 1-2 dos learners in-depth antes de
terminar um projeto creativo do MI de seu próprio escolher. Os 
projetos são apresentados então à classe.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">studio Bamidbar 1-2 dei principianti approfondito 
prima di completare un progetto creativo di MI della loro propria 
scelta. I progetti allora sono presentati al codice categoria.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">οι αρχάριοι μελετούν Bamidbar 1-2 σε βάθος πρίν 
συμπληρώνουν ένα δημιουργικό MI πρόγραμμα της επιλογής τους. 
Τα προγράμματα παρουσιάζονται έπειτα στην κλάση.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">estudio Bamidbar 1-2 de los principiantes 
profundizado antes de terminar un proyecto creativo del MI de su 
propio elegir. Los proyectos entonces se presentan a la clase.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">bamidbar</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">bnei Israel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
